name: @weiyueli7/profile_mcp
description: Extract structured insights from personal and organizational profile pages. Search for people to surface credible sources and get clean summaries, sections, and text excerpts. Accelerate research with guidance for accessing protected content.

tools.name: get_profile
tools.description:
Fetch a profile-like page and return structured context and extracted text.

        Args:
            url: The profile URL (e.g., https://weiyueli7.github.io/)

        Returns:
            dict with keys:
              - url, final_url, status_code, fetched_at
              - extracted: structured fields (person/organization/meta/sections/text_excerpt/full_text)
              - error: present only if an error occurred
              - tips: guidance to access protected content if needed

tools.name: get_default_profile
tools.description:
Convenience wrapper to fetch the requested person's profile page by default:
        https://weiyueli7.github.io/

tools.name: google_search_person
tools.description:
Perform a Google search for a person by name.
        If the user asks about someone other than Weiyue Li, call this first to find sources.

        Args:
            name: Person's name to search (e.g., 'Ada Lovelace')

        Returns:
            dict with keys:
              - query, fetched_at
              - top_results: list[{title, url, snippet}]
              - tips: notes about search and potential fallbacks
